title: I-600A | Application for Advance Processing of an Orphan Petition
description: U.S. citizens who plan to adopt a foreign-born child use this form to allow USCIS to adjudicate the application that relates to the suitability and eligibility of the applicant(s) as prospective adoptive parent(s).

forms.title: Form I-600A/I-600 Supplement 1 (Listing of Adult Member of the Household)
Form I-600A/I-600 Supplement 2 (Consent to Disclose Information)
Form I-600A/I-600 Supplement 3 (Request for Action on Approved Form I-600A/I-600)
